message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $200. This limited edition item has been highly sought after by many, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're placing on this product.  While I'm interested, $200 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $150 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to negotiate further. How about considering the product for $175? This still reflects its value while being more accessible to you.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  $175 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. Let's split the difference - I'll offer you $162.50.  This is a fair price that allows me to buy the product while staying within my budget.
